name: MarketWatch101
tag_list: investment, mortgage, real-estate, money, auto, vacation, property, advice
overview:
MarketWatch101 is a premier investment resource on the internet. We provide advice, information and tools to help you understand the technical jargons while buying a home. Research the interest rate trend, read the current news, find advice on how to choose your loan product, above all think before you decide.

You can sign up for mortgage rate alerts to keep track of the every changing mortgage rates. You can search for homes for sale and for rent. Best of all you can post your home for sale or rent to the web - FREE. Not only will be posted to google and other search engines, it will also be advertised prominently on the home page of marketwatch101.

Better yet, check your house value; get advice if you should refinance; find your investment home, see if it will provide you positive cashflow. Have any questions - send us a note!
